<2>.<2,1>: Specify the default URL and parameters to use when the O4W_CHILD_FORM is invoked without any creation parameters.
<2>.<2,2>: Also define the "shortcut" names to use, and the associated URLs and routines to invoke, when passed specific creation parameters.

record1.<3>: {WIDTH 40}Full default URL{BREAK}(when the O4W_CHILD_FORM is started without creation parameters) {DEFAULT http://localhost/o4w/start.htm}

<4>.<4,1>: Default width (in pixels) for default URL {DEFAULT 800}
<4>.<4,2>: Default height (in pixels) for default URL {DEFAULT 400}
